articles.title: Trade talks open in Beijing amid optimism about an end to U.S.-China dispute

articles.title: Trump to visit U.S.-Mexico border amid shutdown stalemate
articles.description: The visit comes amid a government shutdown in its third week and Trump’s insistence that any funding bill to reopen federal agencies include $5.7 billion for his border wall.

articles.title: ‘No different from my original statements’: Trump denies changes to Syria exit plan

articles.title: Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg misses Supreme Court arguments for first time as she recovers from cancer
articles.description: The 85-year-old justice had cancer surgery on Dec. 21. She had not missed a session since she joined the court in 1993.
